amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 115-259 as en bloc No. 1: 12, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 22, 25, and 26.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Dent amendments (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
